overview:
Mr. Carterâ€™s background and experience spanning over twenty three years encompasses the responsibilities of mergers and acquisitions, financial marketing and communication, retail/ wholesale investment sales, designing corporate investor relations programs including corporate brochures, investor web-sites, due diligence packages and PowerPoint presentations. Mr. Carter has managed all stock related issues with regards to SEC filings, corporate conference calls and Shareholder meetings. He has worked directly with Retail Stockbrokers, Analyst, Investors and Stock Transfer Agents regarding dividend payments, proxies and all aspects of stock certificate maintenance.

Mr. Carter has presented at numerous seminars and conferences pertaining to investment banking and retail investments for groups up to 250 attendees. In addition, for the nine-year period ending January 2005 Mr. Carter hosted his own weekly financial radio show. Mr. Carterâ€™s show (â€œThe Wall Street Edgeâ€) was designed to inform existing and prospective clients of investment opportunities based on national and international economic conditions through personal interviews with Wall St. Analyst, Fund Managers and Corporate CEOâ€™s. Over the past years Mr. Carter has held multiple license including property casualty, life and health, Nevada real estate and 7 SEC security licenses.
